oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Death. The place to which the Bushmen go after death. The various ways of dying, and of being killed (L II.-12. 1173-1243, 13. 1244-1314. 14. 1315-1396). A description of the place where people go to after death as well as various ways of dying, including murder and death from starvation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The place to which people go after death, and various ways of dying and being killed
